column2: The streets of $CAPITAL$ have been flooded with protesters setting up barricades and angrily calling for reform. The more radical elements of the mob also have the audacity to ask for a full Republic.
We Will Crush the Rebellion with one Swift Stroke!

A revolution has broken out in $FROMCOUNTRY$. The capital is flooded with angry protesters and the very future of the monarchy is at stake. The institutional reaction has yet to be seen but there are fears of violence.
A revolution has broken out in $FROMCOUNTRY$. The capital is flooded with angry protesters and the very future of the monarchy is at stake!
A revolution has broken out in $FROMCOUNTRY$ and the capital is flooded with angry protesters.
Inspired by the revolution in Norway, our people have risen up against the Lithuanian oppressors. It is time to regain our independence!
The Hungarians have risen up against their Lithuanian overlords and declared war. Their leaders have sent us an ambassador requesting aid in their struggle.
Let's Teach the Lithuanians a Lesson
These Funds Will Help in the War
Inspired by the revolution in Norway and across Europe, our people have risen up against the French oppressors. It is time to regain our independence!
The $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ people have risen up against their French overlords and declared war. Their leaders have sent us an ambassador requesting aid in their struggle.
Let's Teach the French a Lesson

The Dutch people in the former Duchy of Gelre have risen up against our govenment and had the audacity to demand independence. They are already asking for support from the other Dutch countries and war is now upon us.

The Gelder Revolution has been crushed and the region has returned to the fold. It may take time to heal the wounds of civil strife but, for now, the Duchy is once again an integral part of Brandenburg.
Inspired by the revolutions across Europe, our people have risen up against the English oppressors. It is time to regain our independence!
The Scots have risen up against their English overlords and declared war. Their leaders have sent us an ambassador requesting aid in their struggle.
Let's Teach the English a Lesson
Inspired by the revolutions across Europe, our people have risen up against the Spanish oppressors. It is time to regain our independence!
The Portuguese have risen up against their Spanish overlords and declared war. Their leaders have sent us an ambassador requesting aid in their struggle.
Let's Teach the Spanish a Lesson

The wave of revolution in Europe has finally reached the Americas and has inflamed independentist sentiments. A Declaration of Independence has been signed in Philadelfia and our Garrisons have been attacked across the colony.
Give me liberty or give me death!

The colonists from Nouvelle Flandre have risen up against their $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ overlords and are now fighting for their independence as we did only a few decades ago. Should we assist their struggle?
Let's kick the Europeans out of America!
The colonists from Luisiana have risen up against their $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ overlords and are now fighting for their independence as we did only a few decades ago. Should we assist their struggle?
Let's kick the Europeans out of America!
The revolution in $FROMCOUNTRY$ has deposed the monarchy that tied our two nations together. The King has fled to our country and we will now be ruled as an independent nation.

The ungrateful traitors in $FROMCOUNTRY$ have declared their full separation from $COUNTRY$. This insubordination cannot be allowed to persist, we must prepare our armies to re-establish order in the coming weeks.
